subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Atlético Madrid secured a berth in the Champions League for next season with a 0-0 draw with Granada, and Deportivo La Coruna escaped relegation after tying Barcelona, 2-2.
snippet: Atlético Madrid secured a berth in the Champions League for next season with a 0-0 draw with Granada, and Deportivo La Coruna escaped relegation after tying Barcelona, 2-2.
